org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

接口 ReplicationPeer

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ReplicationPeerImpl

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Replication")
public interface ReplicationPeer
    ReplicationPeer manages enabled / disabled state for the peer.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  ReplicationPeer.PeerState
      State of the peer, whether it is enabled or not

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration getConfiguration()
      Get the configuration object required to communicate with this peer
      String getId()
      Get the identifier of this peer
      Set<String> getNamespaces()
      Get replicable namespace set of this peer
      long getPeerBandwidth()
      Get the per node bandwidth upper limit for this peer
      ReplicationPeerConfig getPeerConfig()
      Get the peer config object
      ReplicationPeer.PeerState getPeerState()
      Returns the state of the peer by reading local cache.
      Map<TableName,List<String>> getTableCFs()
      Get replicable (table, cf-list) map of this peer
      default boolean isPeerEnabled()
      Test whether the peer is enabled.
      void registerPeerConfigListener(ReplicationPeerConfigListener listener)
      Register a peer config listener to catch the peer config change event.
      default void trackPeerConfigChanges(ReplicationPeerConfigListener listener)
      已过时。 
      Use registerPeerConfigListener(ReplicationPeerConfigListener) instead.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getId

        String getId()
        Get the identifier of this peer
        返回:
        string representation of the id

      • getPeerState

        ReplicationPeer.PeerState getPeerState()
        Returns the state of the peer by reading local cache.
        返回:
        the enabled state

      • isPeerEnabled

        default boolean isPeerEnabled()
        Test whether the peer is enabled.
        返回:
        true if enabled, otherwise false.

      • getPeerConfig

        ReplicationPeerConfig getPeerConfig()
        Get the peer config object
        返回:
        the ReplicationPeerConfig for this peer

      • getConfiguration

        org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration getConfiguration()
        Get the configuration object required to communicate with this peer
        返回:
        configuration object

      • getTableCFs

        Map<TableName,List<String>> getTableCFs()
        Get replicable (table, cf-list) map of this peer
        返回:
        the replicable (table, cf-list) map

      • getNamespaces

        Set<String> getNamespaces()
        Get replicable namespace set of this peer
        返回:
        the replicable namespaces set

      • getPeerBandwidth

        long getPeerBandwidth()
        Get the per node bandwidth upper limit for this peer
        返回:
        the bandwidth upper limit

      • registerPeerConfigListener

        void registerPeerConfigListener(ReplicationPeerConfigListener listener)
        Register a peer config listener to catch the peer config change event.
        参数:
        listener - listener to catch the peer config change event.

      • trackPeerConfigChanges

        @Deprecated
default void trackPeerConfigChanges(ReplicationPeerConfigListener listener)
        已过时。 Use registerPeerConfigListener(ReplicationPeerConfigListener) instead.
